segments.text: Hi . I can't get going on my computer until I get a broadband hookup .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just plug the Ethernet cable into your computer , and you'll be off and running .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That would be okay if I had an Ethernet port . Unfortunately , my laptop uses wireless only .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , let me tell you about some alternatives .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anything to get me up and running .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For starters , we have a computer lab .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fantastic ! What do I have to pay per hour ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The lab is completely free . But you do have to pay a dime a page for printing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine . Now tell me about the other alternatives .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just bring your laptop down here to the lobby . We're set up for wireless right here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! I like that suggestion , but what if I need to print something there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately , you'll have to go to the computer lab for your printing needs .
segments.speaker: S2
